articles.title: Why Oppenheimer and Barbie won’t overshadow Alia Bhatt-Ranveer Singh’s Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani - The Indian Express
articles.description: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani box office: What goes in favour of the Karan Johar directorial, despite being hounded by the popularity of Oppenheimer, is the dearth of a big Bollywood spectacle.
articles.content: Karan Johar’s highly anticipated film, Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani, which revolves around a modern couple, Rocky (Ranveer Singh) and Rani (Alia Bhatt) releases this Friday. The film’s team has be… [+5916 chars]
